meanings.definition: The ability to see or perceive something.
meanings.sent1: Her view of the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The view from the top of the mountain was stunning.
meanings.sent3: His view of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The view of success motivated her to keep going.
meanings.sent5: The view of the stars on a clear night is magical.

meanings.definition: A particular way of looking at or thinking about something.
meanings.sent1: From her view, the problem seemed simple.
meanings.sent2: His view on politics is quite different from mine.
meanings.sent3: The cat's view on the new toy was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her view on life is refreshing and inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The child's view of the world is filled with wonder.

meanings.definition: A sight or prospect, especially a scenic one.
meanings.sent1: The ocean view from the hotel room was amazing.
meanings.sent2: The mountain view was worth the long hike.
meanings.sent3: The dog's view of the squirrel was comical.
meanings.sent4: The city view at night was like a sea of lights.
meanings.sent5: The view of the waterfall was mesmerizing.
